caption:
📸: @plasticbank
.
We are so much more than just beauty solutions.. In 2023, we made a conscious decision to lean in to our partnership with #plasticbank where plastics collected from coastlines in 3rd World Countries, is a means of currency which means a better life, and better education for the people🫶🏻. Our packaging is crafted into 100% recycled ocean sourced material so we can do our part to give back too. 
In 2024, our mission is to do as much as we can to continue in this journey.
“Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much.” – Helen Keller

Join the #SocialRecycling movement at the @plasticbank link in bio 💙🙌
.
#PlasticBank #MomentsofUs #StopOceanPlastic #EndPoverty#sustainable #sustainablehaircare
